Culture

Like Follow

This hero's reaction to his girlfriend's selfie is spectacularly dramatic

Share
Tweet
What's This?
By Isobel Hamilton2018-01-18 11:52:45 UTC

This guy should be on the stage.

SEE ALSO: Gift ideas for people in long-distance relationships

A text exchange between a couple has gone viral thanks to the boyfriend going that extra mile in response to his girlfriend sending him a selfie.

Here it is, in all its glory:

I send my boyfriend some selfies I just took while he's at work and this is his response 😂 pic.twitter.com/nviQOYNjVf

— A L E X I A 🌺 (@creoleegyal) January 16, 2018

At time of writing the tweet has over 63,000 retweets, so clearly it's struck a chord.

I’m dying cause he had a coworker help take the pic too. https://t.co/6gGSwkk9wx

— BIG BELLY DEE 🇯🇲 (@DesireeNahFret) January 16, 2018

Man had someone else take a picture of his reaction? I wanna be this in love. https://t.co/piiUprzk6d

— Lord Sesshomaru (@Up_At4am) January 16, 2018

Bro told a co worker to take a picture of him cause his girl looks good. King. https://t.co/Eq0usQ0zJf

— HENDRIX🍄 (@Ayoo_Damoo) January 16, 2018

Hell we about to faint too😩 pic.twitter.com/ijuWDHAeCY

— Miles Webb (@Milesc_Webb) January 16, 2018

He had to have somebody take this picture of him for the sole purpose of sending it as a reaction picture and I am HERE FOR THIS KINDA LOVE

— A. (@eaaaaron___) January 17, 2018

The original poster, meanwhile, felt surprised and flattered at all the attention.

lol it feel weird when people call us goals, we regular schemgular peeps

— A L E X I A 🌺 (@creoleegyal) January 16, 2018

There you have it folks, move along, nothing to see here — other than a super touching display of affection.
